data.name: Pedigree Dog
data.description: Pedigree dog food is made with high-quality ingredients and contains a balanced blend of proteins, carbohydrates, fiber, and essential nutrients that promote strong bones, healthy digestion, and a shiny coat. Their products are available in various forms including dry kibble, wet food, and dog treats. Their dry kibble dog food is made with real meat as the first ingredient and contains essential vitamins and minerals to provide complete and balanced nutrition to dogs. The kibble is designed to help maintain dental health by cleaning teeth and massaging gums with every bite.
